item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:30, so let's meet inside the theater ticket lobby at 7:00. Then I can buy us all tickets, we can get snacks and go enjoy the movie.

Unos afterwards, for anyone interested.

Hope to see you Tuesday night!

--Dana


OLD STUFF:
Maybe I'm just a sucker for Matt Damon (guilty!), but I think Hereafter looks cool. As a reluctant medium, Matt's character comes to realize there are lots of people he can help and that his "gift" isn't something to shy away from. Think Sixth Sense meets Ghost Town.

SUMMARY:
Three people are touched by death in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. On the other side of the world, Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each on a path in search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might--or must--exist in the hereafter.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Hereafter!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Hereafter
